title: Garamond typeface
content:
I am a second year student at Humber College and I need some information on the typeface Garamond and the typographer Claude Garamond himself. I tried looking through the internet but all I found was general information.

 [‹ Typographic Experiment](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017062624/http:/typophile.com/node/38067 "Go to previous forum topic") [Making stem width appear consistent ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017062624/http:/typophile.com/node/37973 "Go to next forum topic")
author: orlenaaa

comments.content:
[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Garamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017062624/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Garamond "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Garamond")

Start with the Wiki article. You need to decide whether you are interested in the specific font created by Jean Jannon or Garamond as a class of fonts.
